comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: California Governor Hiram Johnson was part of the schism in the Republican party, he became a Progressive with TR. He was governor of California from 1911-1917 and later had Presidential aspirations. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hiram_Johnson George Pardee was Governor of California from 1903-1907. He was a Republican. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Pardee
